sentence.Network_en: Eliza goes down on her knees on the hearthrug to look for the ring.
sentence.Network_cn: 伊莉莎在炉前地毯上跪下来寻找那戒指.

sentence.Network_en: Tom Thumb and Hunca Munca went cautiously across the hearthrug.
sentence.Network_cn: 汤姆大拇和亨卡忙卡小心翼翼地穿过壁炉前的地毯.
